bill.summary:
Indian Health Service Advance Appropriations Act of 2019
This bill authorizes advance appropriations for the following Indian Health Service appropriations accounts:
Indian Health Services, Indian Health Facilities, and Contract Support Costs. The advance appropriations provide new budget authority that first becomes available in the first fiscal year after the budget year. The bill requires the President's budget request to include information on estimates for the advance appropriations.
